articles.title: Meteor lit up sky over Niagara Falls, CN Tower early Saturday morning | Globalnews.ca - Global News
articles.description: The European Space Agency shared video of the meteor, named #C8FF042 and around one metre in diameter, passing across the CN Tower.
articles.content:
A meteor briefly lit up the sky behind Toronto’s CN Tower and above Niagara Falls overnight.
The European Space Agency shared video of the meteor in the early hours of Saturday morning, named #C8FF0… [+722 chars]
